728983f-a.text:
4712 Hylan Boulevard, adjoining the S.W. corner of Richmond Avenue. This house was on the property of the Empire City Fishing Club (1917-1907 maps), and prior to that it was on the Wm. Hastings estate.
May 14, 1932.
P.L. Sperr
728983f-a.folder: Hylan Boulevard & Richmond Avenue, Staten Island, NY
